alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A CLUSTER OF STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN FOREST...CENTRAL MARINETTE...SOUTHEASTERN ONEIDA AND NORTHEASTERN LANGLADE COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over northern Langlade and southern Forest counties, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Woodlawn around 505 PM CDT. Carter around 520 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Post Lake, Blackwell, Otter Springs Recreation Area, Pelican Lake, Nashville, Choate, Mole Lake, Lily, Laona, and Goodman County Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida
